column1: Local Foods////Not worth going again. yes
column3: it's organic (at least they claim to be). But the sandwiches are so bland
column4: and with that kind of price? Might as well going to Subway twice. I would've given one star
column5: but the dining place is nice
column6: so I give them an extra star. Oh
column7: and parking sucks! It's within Rice Village afterall.
